Mansfield Park

******

Volume I, Chapter 1

******

About thirty years ago Miss cast.mrsbetram___, of Huntingdon, with only seven thousand pounds, had the good luck to captivate Sir cast.thomasbetram,

—of Mansfield Park, in the county of Northampton, and to be thereby raised to the rank of a baronet's lady,

—with all the comforts and consequences of an handsome house and large income.

******

All Huntingdon exclaimed on the greatness of the match, and her uncle, the lawyer, himself,

—allowed her to be at least three thousand pounds short of any equitable claim to it.
